name: Development Hell
description:
Development Hell

Development Hell is a game about a game that's being developed. (Ideally played in full screen). Approximately 10 minutes in length.

Created for the Weekly Game Jam #61: https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-61 based on the theme: 'Update a Game'.

The game was created in 1 week using Unity, Krita, GIMP, Inky and SFXR,

Music featured was made by Kevin MacLeod over at: https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/music.html
